ygData.subject: Re: help please
ygData.msgSnippet: I have done this quest. I had no problem with the lion spawning; are you sure you are opening the right door? The guy says the left hand door in the wall of
ygData.messageBody:
I have done this quest. I had no problem with the lion spawning; are you
sure you are opening the right door?

The guy says 'the left hand door in the wall of three' I think... double
check and open that door first.

Also I did this quest before the patch, it is possible that it may have been
broken. If you continue to not find the lion, petition about it as well as
email questhelp@....

good luck
----- Original Message -----
From: Rose M. Glass <rosemg@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 23, 1999 11:42 AM
Subject: [EQCheats] help please


: From: "Rose M. Glass" <rosemg@...>
:
: Hello
:
: I'm a bit stuck. I'm a level 4 warrior and would like to do the
: last part of the Steal Warrior Initiation in Qyenos.
:
: I have the key, but when I go to the pens and open the doors
: there is nothing in them.
:
: Do I have to be a higher level to do this quest or am I useing
: the key wrong? Right now I just click the key on the door,
: nothing happens but the door opening and me still having the key.
:
: Thank you
:
: --
: "Smoke me a Kipper, I'll be back for breakfast!" -- Ace Rimmer
: Red Dwarf Season four, Dimension Jump
